√śad2 'fall'

perfect: śaśāda  śedus  

[aorist: [2.] aśadat  ]

future: [1.] śatsyati   -- [2.] śattā  

verbal: śanna  

[secondary: intensive: śāśad-   -- desiderative: śīśatsa-   -- causative: śādaya-  ]

derivatives: śada  śā́da V.B.  śādana C.  

Compare √śat, assigned by the grammarians to this root as another causative, and √1śī, regarded by them as its present-system.
